title: One week ban in ranked on new champs
body: Idea taken from NA boards. New champs should be disabled in ranked for one week. For LP purposes.

replies.body:
If your issue is people playing it badly, then its more likely theres a bad ekko on the other team anyway.
If your issue is not knowing how to play against it, then this will just delay the problem for a week.
Plus a lot of people only play ranked. They'll just be first timing it a week later and it'll be hardly any different anyway.
There are FAR greater problems in ranked then someone playing the new champ.

Why?

Okay, fair enough you haven't mastered the Champion but other people also haven't mastered versing him so it's a catch-22 and still depends on skill, experience and whilst there is the downside of you not having a firm understanding of matchups etc even if you have the kit down-pat - counters are pretty straight forward once you know all the Champs in the game and playing a new Kit with new scaling and knowing which items to take and which Champions are strong against you isn't that difficult.
You didn't even read what I said did you?
Don't try and reason with them.
New or reworked champs aren't allowed in the pro games for several weeks, why should they be allowed in ranked without the same cooldown period?
No LCS team would go Ekko, they'd go champs they're better with

Mainly for balance reasons haha which actually goes with what I said about not only you not being as experienced with them but the enemy team not being as experienced against them - as well as the fact they probably need a nerf like oh- everyone riot releases because popularity = power.
i fucken hate wasting 1 ban on new champions cause retards want to first time them
but i beat a talon in lane as ekko who was a diamond smurf. he confirmed it himself
